TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LayoutEditorPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart
Public NotInheritable Class LayoutEditorPart Inherits EditorPart

summary.span: 提供編輯器控制項，可讓使用者編輯相關聯 控制項上的數個配置導向的使用者介面 (UI) 屬性。

span.span: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several layout-oriented user interface (UI) properties on an associated control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 類別是衍生自的編輯器控制項類別，並會用來編輯會影響配置相關聯的屬性或控制項。The class is an editor control that derives from the class, and is used to edit properties that affect the layout of an associated or control. 就像 Web 組件控制項集合中有工具導向的區域 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀)、 有工具導向組件控制項 （工具組件），且每個工具組件必須位在特定類型的工具區域。Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the class overview), there are tool-oriented part controls (tool parts), and each tool part must reside in a certain type of tool zone. Web 組件控制項集合中的工具組件具有兩個特殊的特性：Tool parts in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics: - 它們是 helper 控制項，可讓使用者以個人化 Web 組件頁面上的控制項。They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize controls on a Web Parts page. - 它們會顯示只在特定的顯示模式。They are visible only in certain display modes. 控制項是一種工具的部分，變成可見的只有在 Web 組件頁面處於編輯模式，且時特定已選取要編輯的控制項。The control is a tool part that becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific control has been selected for editing. 控制項，如同所有其他控制，位於控制項。The control, like all other controls, resides in an control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 只能包含區域控制項和控制項不能放在任何其他類型的區域。An zone can contain only controls, and controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone. 類別具有屬性，取得或設定版面配置控制項的標題。The class has a property, which gets or sets the title for a layout control. 此類別也具有屬性，它會覆寫基底屬性，並傳回`true`。The class also has a property, which overrides the base property and returns `true`. 這表示控制項一律會顯示當頁面處於編輯模式，即使屬性正在編輯的控制項設為`false`。This means that the control is always visible when the page is in edit mode, even if the property on the control being edited is set to `false`. 換句話說，使用者可以編輯中的屬性控制項，即使指定其他不能編輯控制項控制項。In other words, users can always edit the properties in a control, even if a specified control cannot be edited by the other controls. 類別也有兩個重要的方法，和，它繼承自類別並覆寫。The class also has two important methods, and , which it inherits from the class and overrides. 方法非常重要，因為它們可讓取得和設定的編輯器控制項的欄位值和屬性之間的屬性值上控制所編輯。The methods are critical because they enable getting and setting the property values between the field values of the editor control and the properties on the control being edited. 在大部分情況下，控制項應該使用頁面持續性格式，藉由宣告``元素內``元素，又包含由``網頁上的項目。In most cases, the control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `` element inside a `` element, which is in turn contained by an `` element on a Web page. 控制項可讓終端使用者編輯的下列 UI 屬性控制項：The control enables end users to edit the following UI properties of a control: - - - 若要編輯其他屬性和行為控制項，您可以使用其他提供 Web 組件控制項集合的控制項。To edit other properties and behavior of controls, you can use the other controls supplied with the Web Parts control set. 這些控制項包括、 ，而控制項。These controls include the , the , and the control. 提供控制項應該提供編輯所需的大部分編輯功能控制項，但您也可以建立自訂編輯器控制項繼承自類別。The supplied controls should provide most editing features required to edit controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the class. 如需程式碼範例，請參閱類別概觀。For a code example, see the class overview. > [!NOTE] > 若要改善存取範圍，內呈現控制項`
`項目。To improve accessibility, the control is rendered within a `
` element. `
`項目群組的一組相關的使用中進行編輯的控制項控制項，以及它協助視覺化使用者代理程式 （例如一般的網頁瀏覽器） 和語音導向使用者代理程式 （在這些控制項之間的索引標籤式瀏覽例如，螢幕讀取軟體）。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 根據預設，此控制項呈現標記可能不符合協助工具標準，例如網頁內容的指導方針 1.0 (WCAG) 優先權 1 指導方針。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 如需對這個控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告控制在網頁上，並讓它編輯有幾項 UI 屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declare a control on a Web page, and enable it to edit several UI properties of a control. 程式碼範例包含三個部分：The code example has three parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 網頁包含控制項和控制項，用來編輯配置屬性的控制項。A Web page that contains an control and a control, which is used to edit the layout properties of a control. - 當您載入瀏覽器中的，此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#5)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 它包含的宣告式參考控制項和子系``包含宣告式參考的項目控制項。It contains a declarative reference to an control, with a child `` element that contains declarative references to a control. 請注意，這個頁面也包含已繫結控制項至 Pubs 資料庫; 因為此控制項位於區域，它是做為可以編輯的控制項控制項。Note that the page also contains a control that is bound to the Pubs database; because this control resides in a zone, it functions as a control that can be edited by the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview/CS/layouteditorpartcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview/VB/layouteditorpartvb.aspx#1)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）**作者清單 web 組件**控制項，然後按一下 **編輯**開始編輯。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **Author List WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to begin editing. 顯示編輯的 UI 時，您可以看到控制項，以及位於其上方的按鈕和文字方塊的方塊。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the control, and a button and text box positioned above it. 如果您進行一些變更中編輯 UI 按一下**套用** 按鈕，您可以使用**顯示模式**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式，並查看完整的編輯變更影響的下拉式清單控制項。If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.

MemberSignature.Value: public LayoutEditorPart ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: LayoutEditorPart();

summary.span: 建立類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式是預設值，則沒有建構函式宣告中類別，因此沒有特殊的工作會執行建立類別的新執行個體時。The constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created. 通常您不需要使用建構函式，因為您可以加入控制項以宣告方式在設計階段的頁面。Normally you do not need to use the constructor, because you can add a control to a page declaratively at design time. 不過，如果您需要加入控制項以程式設計方式基於某些原因，您可以使用建構函式。However, if you need to add a control programmatically for some reason, you can use the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool ApplyChanges ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool ApplyChanges() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ApplyChanges () As Boolean
public: override bool ApplyChanges();

summary.span: 將值從 控制項儲存至相關聯 控制項中相應的屬性。

span.span: Saves the values from a control to the corresponding properties in the associated control.

returns.span: 如果將值從 控制項儲存至 控制項的動作順利進行，則為 ，否則 (如果發生錯誤) 為 。

span.span: if the action of saving values from the control to the control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是關鍵的方法上控制項。The method is a critical method on a control. 方法的目的是要儲存的使用者已設定的值中相關聯的對應屬性的控制項控制項。The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on a control to the corresponding properties in the associated control. 在參考相關聯的控制項控制項的繼承屬性。The associated control is referenced in the control's inherited property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您不能呼叫從自己的程式碼的方法。You cannot call the method from your own code. 不過，如果您需要編輯不同的程序需以程式設計方式控制控制屬性比提供控制項，您可以建立自訂控制，並提供這個方法的實作。However, if you need more programmatic control over the process of editing various control properties than the control provides, you can create a custom control and provide your own implementation of this method. 如需範例，請參閱方法。For an example, see the method. 方法會嘗試設定下列的屬性相關聯控制項：The method attempts to set the following properties on the associated control: - - - 方法在使用者按一下按鈕，表示確定或編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 中套用動詞命令時呼叫。The method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI).

exception.span: 在相關聯 控制項上設定 屬性的值時，發生錯誤。

span.span: An error occurred when setting the value of the property on the associated control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void CreateChildControls ();
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void CreateChildControls() cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub CreateChildControls ()
protected public: override void CreateChildControls();
public override string DefaultButton { get; set; }
.property instance string DefaultButton
Public Overrides Property DefaultButton As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DefaultButton { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 覆寫繼承自 控制項的基底屬性，並從設計工具隱藏該屬性，防止它受主題的影響。

span.span: Overrides the base property inherited from the control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.

value.span: 字串，包含收到 控制項中預設焦點之 控制項的 ID。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the control that receives the default focus in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然它是公用的，但這個屬性僅用於此控制項的預設呈現，而不可以從開發人員程式碼進行呼叫。Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool Display { get; }
.property instance bool Display
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Display As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Display { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出當與控制項相關聯的 控制項處於編輯模式時，是否應該顯示該控制項。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated control is in edit mode.

value.span: 布林值，指出是否應該顯示控制項。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回`true`即使屬性是`false`上相關聯控制項。The property returns `true` even if the property is `false` on the associated control. 這是讓控制項一律可在編輯模式中使用，即使其他不能編輯控制項控制項。This is so that the control can always be available in edit mode, even when a control cannot be edited by the other controls.

Public Overrides Sub SyncChanges ()
public: override void SyncChanges();

summary.span: 擷取 控制項的屬性值，並將它們指派給相關聯的 控制項。

span.span: Retrieves the property values from a control and assigns them to the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是關鍵的方法上控制項。The method is a critical method on a control. 它會實作基底類別的方法會擷取目前的值從相關聯控制項，以及更新中的子控制項具有這些值，讓使用者編輯控制項。It implements the method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated control, and updates the child controls in the control with those values so a user can edit them. 方法呼叫時中相關聯的值控制項可能已變更。The method is called whenever the values in the associated control might have changed. 如控制項，區域，其中包含控制呼叫方法後立即呼叫方法，使中的值控制項一律會同步處理中的值相關聯控制項。For a control, the zone that contains the control calls the method immediately after calling the method, so that the values in the control are always synchronized with the values in the associated control. 另一種情況其中方法呼叫時控制項一開始會進入編輯模式。Another case where the method is called is when a control is initially entering edit mode.

para.span: 雖然您可以呼叫您的程式碼的方法，不需要執行這項操作。

span.span: Although you can call the method from your code, it is not necessary to do so.

para.span: Web 組件控制項集合會呼叫這個方法和與及其相關聯的方法，在編輯控制項編輯的處理序中適當的時間同步處理控制項。

span.span: The Web Parts control set calls this method and the method at the proper times in the editing process to keep editing controls synchronized with their associated controls.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Title { get; set; }
.property instance string Title
Public Overrides Property Title As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定編輯器控制項的標題。

span.span: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.

value.span: 做為控制項標題的字串。

span.span: A string that is used as the title of the control.

value.span: 預設值是 Web 組件控制項集合所提供的計算控制項名稱。

span.span: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值會顯示在標題列控制控制項時顯示在編輯模式。The property value is displayed in the title bar of a control when the control is visible in edit mode. 控制項在頁面中宣告時，您可以設定的值`Title`屬性。When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute. 如果您未提供標題的值，特定文化特性的預設值用來描述此控制項可讓使用者編輯的屬性。If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the properties that this control allows users to edit. ## Examples 這個程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性控制項。This code example demonstrates how to use the property of a control. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 下列程式碼示範如何在設定標題以宣告方式在網頁中的控制項。The following code shows how to set the title on a control declaratively in a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview/CS/layouteditorpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview/VB/layouteditorpartvb.aspx#2)] 下一個部分的程式碼範例示範如何設定的值屬性以程式設計的方式。The next part of the code example shows how to set the value of the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview/CS/layouteditorpartcs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview/VB/layouteditorpartvb.aspx#3)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）**作者清單 web 組件**控制項，然後按一下 **編輯**開始編輯。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **Author List WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to begin editing. 編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 可見時，您可以看到控制項，以及位於其上方的按鈕和文字方塊的方塊。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see the control, and a button and text box positioned above it. 請注意，標題控制項是在網頁上的宣告式標記指派給它的值。Note that the title of the control is the value assigned to it in the declarative markup of the Web page. 如果您輸入一些文字在文字方塊旁邊**更新 EditorPart 標題**按鈕，然後再按一下按鈕標題的控制項也會更新。If you enter some text in the text box next to the **Update EditorPart Title** button, and then click the button, the title for the control is updated.
